General.Name: A-Tech Solution Co. Ltd
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: A-Tech Solution Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells injection molds and stamping dies in South Korea and internationally. The company offers injection molds for automotive parts, electronic parts, tooling, and machines; stamping die for automotive parts, including moving panels, high tension steels, and progressive tools; vacuum/foaming molds for refrigerators, foaming molds for interior automotive parts, and press molds for home appliance parts; and composite tools. It also provides precision press dies, press dies, precision gear molds, automotive components, OA components, optics components, and semiconductor components. A-Tech Solution Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Hwaseong, South Korea.
